data.actual_result: When you scroll down too fast, you will notice that some members will smash up against the role, aka Online - number
data.expected_result: Member list should go up as its being scrolled down, and nothing is being smashed.
data.short_description: Users Fly Upwards and Smashes with Role Name when Scrolling Down Too Fast
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to an huge server such as DTesters, DFeedback, DDevs, etc. - Make sure you are in a general channel. - Scroll down the member list slowly at first to observe, then scroll down as fast that you possibly can.
